controllers.name: controllers
controllers.description: Controllers provide all server route actions.

models.name: models
models.description: Models module includes all portal models.

providers.name: providers
providers.description: Providers module includes all portal providers.

AuthenticationController.name: AuthenticationController
AuthenticationController.description: Defines an AuthenticationController to deal with user authentication.

CategoriesController.name: CategoriesController
CategoriesController.description: Defines a CategoriesController to deal with OpenVeo Publish categories.

DefaultController.name: DefaultController
DefaultController.description: Defines a DefaultController to deal with AngularJS single page application.

ErrorController.name: ErrorController
ErrorController.description: Defines a ErrorController to deal with errors.

FiltersController.name: FiltersController
FiltersController.description: Defines a FiltersController to deal with video filters.

FrontPageVideosController.name: FrontPageVideosController
FrontPageVideosController.description: Defines a FrontPageVideosController to deal with promoted videos.

GroupsController.name: GroupsController
GroupsController.description: Defines a GroupsController to deal with OpenVeo groups.

LiveController.name: LiveController
LiveController.description: Defines a LiveController to deal with the live page.

SettingsController.name: SettingsController
SettingsController.description: Defines a SettingsController to deal with portal settings.

statisticsController.name: statisticsController
statisticsController.description: Provides route actions for all requests relative to statistics.

StatisticsController.name: StatisticsController
StatisticsController.description: Defines a StatisticsController to deal with portal statistics.

VersionController.name: VersionController
VersionController.description: Defines a VersionController to deal with project version.

VideosController.name: VideosController
VideosController.description: Defines a VideosController to deal with videos.

SettingsModel.name: SettingsModel
SettingsModel.description: Defines a SettingsModel to manipulate settings.

UserModel.name: UserModel
UserModel.description: Defines a UserModel to manipulate back end users.

UserProvider.name: UserProvider
UserProvider.description: Defines a UserProvider to get and save back end users.

FilterCache.name: FilterCache
FilterCache.description: Provides all caches relative to filter.

VideoCache.name: VideoCache
VideoCache.description: Provides all caches relative to videos.

Server.name: Server
Server.description: Creates a new Portal HTTP server.

WebserviceClient.name: WebserviceClient
WebserviceClient.description: Defines a unique OpenVeo Web Service client.

authenticator.name: authenticator
authenticator.description:
The authenticator helps manipulate users authenticated by passport strategies.

Users returned by passport are not necessary OpenVeo Portal users. It could be users from a third party
authentication server. The authenticator helps making sure that the authenticated user is a ready to
use OpenVeo Portal user.

context.name: context

HTTP_ERRORS.name: HTTP_ERRORS
HTTP_ERRORS.description:
The list of HTTP errors with, for each error, its associated hexadecimal code and HTTP return code.
HTTP errors are sent by {{#crossLinkModule 'controllers'}}{{/crossLinkModule}}.

classitems.description: Handles user authentication using internal providers (which do not require a redirection to a third party site).

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Handles user authentication using external providers (which require a redirection on third party site).
classitems.name: authenticateExternalAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Logs out user.

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Checks if current request is authenticated.

If not send back an HTTP code 401 with appropriate page.
It just go to the next route action if permission is granted.
classitems.name: restrictAction

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.name: getCategoriesAction

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Handles default action to display main HTML.

If no other action were performed display the main template.
Main template loads libraries JavaScript files, Bootstrap CSS file and CSS file from the configured theme.
classitems.name: defaultAction

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.name: defaultBackOfficeAction

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Handles default web service actions.

Send back an HTTP code 404.

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.name: notFoundAction

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

params.description: An error object with error code, HTTP code and error message

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets the list of available video filters.
classitems.name: getFiltersAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Handles front-page videos action to get videos ranks with details.

Fetches configuration of front-page videos with details about the specified videos.
Videos fetched from OpenVeo are stored in cache.

params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Verify that a user has not seen the video more than one time during the video duration
Increase video count when needed

Handles version action to get information about OpenVeo Portal version.

It requests Github atom feed to get the latest available version of OpenVeo Portal.
Then version is compared to actual one using semver.
classitems.name: getVersionAction

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Searches OpenVeo Publish videos.
classitems.name: searchAction

props.name: filter.query
props.description:
Filter to get only videos which contain the query
inside the title or description

props.name: filter.dateStart
props.description: Filter to get only videos after a particular date

props.name: filter.dateEnd
props.description: Filter to get only videos before a particular date

props.name: filter.sortBy
props.description: The name of the property to sort by (either "views" or "date")

props.name: filter.sortOrder
props.description: The order of the sort (either "asc" or "desc")

props.name: pagination
props.description: Pagination to set limit and page

props.name: pagination.limit
props.description: Maximum number of videos to retreive

props.name: pagination.page
props.description: The number of the page to retrieve

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description: Gets details about an OpenVeo Publish video.
classitems.name: getVideoAction

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the video to fetch

params.name: next
params.description: Function to defer execution to the next registered middleware

classitems.description:
Adds a new setting.

If setting already exists with the given id, no addition is performed.
classitems.name: add

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The added setting

classitems.description:
Updates a setting.

If setting does not exist it is automatically created.
classitems.name: update

params.name: id
params.description: The id of setting to update

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of updated / added items

classitems.description: Gets a local user by credentials.
classitems.name: getUserByCredentials

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Object** The user

classitems.description: Adds a new user.
classitems.name: add

props.name: id
props.description: User's id, if not specified an id will be generated

props.name: locked
props.description: true to lock user from modifications

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The inserted user

classitems.description: Updates a user.
classitems.name: update

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the user to update

props.name: locked
props.description: true to lock user from edition

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The number of updated items

classitems.description: Adds a third party provider user.
classitems.name: addThirdPartyUser

props.name: id
props.description: User's id, if not specified an id will be generated

params.name: origin
params.description: Id of the third party provider system

params.name: originId
params.description: The user id in third party provider system

params.name: originGroups
params.description: The user groups in third party provider system

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items inserted
  - **Object** The inserted user

classitems.description: Updates a third party provider user.
classitems.name: updateThirdPartyUser

props.name: originGroups
props.description: User's groups in third party provider system

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Number** The total amount of items updates

classitems.description: Serializes only essential user information required to retrieve it later.
classitems.name: serializeUser

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **String** The serialized user information

classitems.description: Fetches a user from serialized data.
classitems.name: deserializeUser

params.name: data
params.description: Serialized data as serialized by serializeUser(), the id of the user

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when it's done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise
  - **Object** The user with its permissions

params.description:
Function to call when its done
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise
 - **Object** The user with its permissions

classitems.description:
Verifies user as returned by third party providers.

OpenVeo Portal trusts users from third party providers, if the user does not exist in OpenVeo Portal
it is created with minimum information.
classitems.name: verifyUserAuthentication

params.name: thirdPartyUser
params.description: The user from the third party provider

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function to call when its done
 - **Error** An error if something went wrong, null otherwise
 - **Object** The user with its permissions

classitems.description: A server error occurring when no error were specified.
classitems.name: UNKNOWN_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when server configuration is not valid.
classitems.name: CONF_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when searching for videos, using the Web Service, failed.
classitems.name: SEARCH_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating the user to the back end.
classitems.name: BACK_END_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating using an external provider (which require redirection).
classitems.name: BACK_END_EXTERNAL_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating the user to CAS.
classitems.name: CAS_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating the user to LDAP.
classitems.name: LDAP_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting a video from Web Service failed.
classitems.name: GET_VIDEO_UNKNOWN

classitems.description: A server error occurring when updating settings.
classitems.name: UPDATE_SETTINGS_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting a setting.
classitems.name: GET_SETTING_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting OpenVeo groups.
classitems.name: GET_GROUPS_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting a setting while processing default action.
classitems.name: DEFAULT_GET_SETTING_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting a setting while processing live action.
classitems.name: LIVE_GET_SETTING_ERROR

classitems.description:
A server error occurring when getting front-page videos setting while computing the front-page videos
configuration with details about videos.
classitems.name: FRONT_PAGE_VIDEOS_GET_DETAILED_VIDEOS_SETTING_ERROR

classitems.description: A server error occurring when routes has not been found.
classitems.name: PATH_NOT_FOUND

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user authentication to CAS failed.
classitems.name: CAS_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user authentication to the back end failed using an external provider.
classitems.name: BACK_END_EXTERNAL_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user authentication to LDAP failed.
classitems.name: LDAP_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user authentication to the back end failed.
classitems.name: BACK_END_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user is not allowed to get a video.
classitems.name: GET_VIDEO_NOT_ALLOWED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when a back office authentication is needed to perform the action.
classitems.name: BACK_END_UNAUTHORIZED

classitems.description: A server error occurring when user connected to the back office is not authorized to perform an action.
classitems.name: BACK_END_FORBIDDEN

classitems.description: A server error occurring when connected user is not authorized to access live.
classitems.name: LIVE_FORBIDDEN

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating to external provider with wrong parameters.
classitems.name: AUTHENTICATE_EXTERNAL_WRONG_PARAMETERS

classitems.description: A server error occurring when authenticating to internal provider with wrong parameters.
classitems.name: AUTHENTICATE_INTERNAL_WRONG_PARAMETERS

classitems.description: A server error occurring when getting a setting with missing parameters.
classitems.name: GET_SETTING_MISSING_PARAMETERS

classitems.description: A server error occurring when updating settings with missing parameters.
classitems.name: UPDATE_SETTINGS_MISSING_PARAMETERS

classitems.description: A server error occurring when updating settings with wrong parameters.
classitems.name: UPDATE_SETTINGS_WRONG_PARAMETERS
